verses.verse: There is <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation<s%> for <S%G3588>those<s%> who are in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

For the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> has <S%G1659>set<s%> you <S%G1659>free<s%> from the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> and of <S%G2288>death.<s%>

For <S%G102>what<s%> the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G102>could<s%> not do, <S%G770>weak<s%> as it was <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> [did: ] <S%G3992>sending<s%> His <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> in the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> of <S%G266>sinful<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and [as an offering] for <S%G266>sin,<s%> He <S%G2632>condemned<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%>

in <S%G2443>order<s%> that the <S%G1345>requirement<s%> of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in us, who do not <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

For <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G5426>set<s%> their <S%G5426>minds<s%> on the things of the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> but <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> the things of the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

For the <S%G5427>mind<s%> <S%G5427>set<s%> on the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G2288>death,<s%> but the <S%G5427>mind<s%> <S%G5427>set<s%> on the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G2222>life<s%> and <S%G1515>peace,<s%>

<S%G1360>because<s%> the <S%G5427>mind<s%> <S%G5427>set<s%> on the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G2189>hostile<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> for it does not <S%G5293>subject<s%> itself to the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> for it is not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> [to do so];
and <S%G3588>those<s%> who are in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>However,<s%> you are not in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> but in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1512>if<s%> <S%G1512>indeed<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3611>dwells<s%> in you. But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> does not <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he does not <S%G1510>belong<s%> to Him.

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is in you, <S%G3303>though<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> is <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> is <S%G2222>alive<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of Him who <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3611>dwells<s%> in you, He who <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2227>give<s%> <S%G2227>life<s%> to your <S%G2349>mortal<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> His <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> who <S%G1774>indwells<s%> you.

<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> we are <S%G3781>under<s%> <S%G3781>obligation,<s%> not to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> to <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> â€“

for <S%G1487>if<s%> you are <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> you <S%G3195>must<s%> <S%G599>die;<s%> but <S%G1487>if<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> you are <S%G2289>putting<s%> to <S%G2289>death<s%> the <S%G4234>deeds<s%> of the <S%G4983>body,<s%> you will <S%G2198>live.<s%>
For <S%G3745>all<s%> <S%G3745>who<s%> are being <S%G71>led<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> are <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For you have not <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G1397>slavery<s%> <S%G1519>leading<s%> to <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> but you have <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G5206>adoption<s%> as <S%G5206>sons<s%> by <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2896>cry<s%> out, "Abba! <S%G5>Father!<s%>"
The <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G4828>bears<s%> <S%G4828>witness<s%> with our <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that we are <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

and <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5043>children,<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G4789>fellow<s%> <S%G4789>heirs<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1512>if<s%> <S%G1512>indeed<s%> we <S%G4841>suffer<s%> with [Him] in <S%G2443>order<s%> that we may <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G4888>glorified<s%> with [Him.]

For I <S%G3049>consider<s%> that the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> are not <S%G514>worthy<s%> to be compared with the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that is to be <S%G601>revealed<s%> to us.
For the <S%G603>anxious<s%> <S%G603>longing<s%> of the <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G553>waits<s%> <S%G553>eagerly<s%> for the <S%G602>revealing<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For the <S%G2937>creation<s%> was <S%G5293>subjected<s%> to <S%G3153>futility,<s%> not of its <S%G1635>own<s%> <S%G1635>will,<s%> but <S%G1223>because<s%> of Him who <S%G5293>subjected<s%> it, in <S%G1680>hope<s%>

that the <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> will be <S%G1659>set<s%> <S%G1659>free<s%> from its <S%G1397>slavery<s%> to <S%G5356>corruption<s%> into the <S%G1657>freedom<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For we <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G4959>groans<s%> and <S%G4944>suffers<s%> the <S%G4944>pains<s%> of <S%G4944>childbirth<s%> <S%G4959>together<s%> <S%G4944><s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G3568>now.<s%>

And not <S%G3440>only<s%> this, but <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G846>ourselves,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G536>first<s%> <S%G536>fruits<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> we <S%G846>ourselves<s%> <S%G4727>groan<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> <S%G553>waiting<s%> <S%G553>eagerly<s%> for [our] <S%G5206>adoption<s%> as <S%G5206>sons,<s%> the <S%G629>redemption<s%> of our <S%G4983>body.<s%>

For in <S%G1680>hope<s%> we have been <S%G4982>saved,<s%> but <S%G1680>hope<s%> that is <S%G991>seen<s%> is not <S%G1680>hope;<s%> for <S%G5101>why<s%> does <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1679>hope<s%> for <S%G3739>what<s%> he <S%G991>sees<s%>?
But <S%G1487>if<s%> we <S%G1679>hope<s%> for <S%G3739>what<s%> we do not <S%G991>see,<s%> with <S%G5281>perseverance<s%> we <S%G553>wait<s%> <S%G553>eagerly<s%> for it.

And in the <S%G5615>same<s%> <S%G5615>way<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4878>helps<s%> our <S%G769>weakness;<s%> for we do not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G5101>how<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%> as we <S%G1163>should,<s%> but the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G5241>intercedes<s%> for [us] with <S%G4726>groanings<s%> <S%G215>too<s%> <S%G215>deep<s%> for <S%G215>words;<s%>

and He who <S%G2045>searches<s%> the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G3609>knows<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G5427>mind<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is, <S%G3754>because<s%> He <S%G1793>intercedes<s%> for the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to [the will of] <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And we <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4903>causes<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> to <S%G4903>work<s%> <S%G4903>together<s%> for <S%G18>good<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2822>called<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to [His] <S%G4286>purpose.<s%>

For <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G4267>foreknew,<s%> He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4309>predestined<s%> [to become] <S%G4832>conformed<s%> to the <S%G1504>image<s%> of His <S%G5207>Son,<s%> that He might be the first-born <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G80>brethren;<s%>

and <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G4309>predestined,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2564>called;<s%> and <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G2564>called,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1344>justified;<s%> and <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G1344>justified,<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> He <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1392>glorified.<s%>
<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall we <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%>? <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> [is] for us, <S%G5101>who<s%> [is] <S%G2596>against<s%> us?

He <S%G3739>who<s%> did not <S%G5339>spare<s%> His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5207>Son,<s%> but <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Him up for us <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> will He not <S%G2532>also<s%> with Him <S%G5483>freely<s%> <S%G5483>give<s%> us <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%>?
<S%G5101>Who<s%> will <S%G1458>bring<s%> a <S%G1458>charge<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1588>elect<s%>? God is the one who <S%G1344>justifies;<s%>

<S%G5101>who<s%> is the one who <S%G2632>condemns<s%>? <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is He who <S%G599>died,<s%> <S%G1161>yes,<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> who was <S%G1453>raised,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is at the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1793>intercedes<s%> for us.

<S%G5101>Who<s%> shall <S%G5563>separate<s%> us from the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>? Shall <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4730>distress,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1375>persecution,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3042>famine,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1132>nakedness,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2794>peril,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3162>sword<s%>?

<S%G2531>Just<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> "For Thy <S%G1752>sake<s%> we are being <S%G2289>put<s%> to <S%G2289>death<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> long; We were <S%G3049>considered<s%> as <S%G4263>sheep<s%> to be <S%G4967>slaughtered.<s%>"
But in <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> we <S%G5245>overwhelmingly<s%> <S%G5245>conquer<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> Him who <S%G25>loved<s%> us.

For I am <S%G3982>convinced<s%> that <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G746>principalities,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1764>things<s%> <S%G1764>present,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G3195>things<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1411>powers,<s%>

<S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G5313>height,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G899>depth,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G2937>created<s%> <S%G2937>thing,<s%> shall be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5563>separate<s%> us from the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> which is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
